roleset.name: distribute again

example.name: just theme
example.text: [About a quarter of this share]-9 has already been reallocated [*-9], according to the industry, but the remaining 23,403 tons are still a lucrative target for growers because the current U.S. price of 18 cents a pound runs as much as a nickel a pound above the world rate.

example.name: with source
example.text: [*] To accommodate the additional cash assistance, the House Appropriations Committee last week was required [*] to reallocate an estimated $140 million [*U*] from the Pentagon.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: they are reapportioned to all recipients.

roleset.note: REAPPORTION-V NOTES: I actually read the "from the Pentagon" as part of the $140 million,but Treebank disagrees with me. As usual. (from reapportion.01-v)
